meanings.definition: Happened as an effect or outcome.
meanings.sent1: The storm resulted in flooding in the town.
meanings.sent2: The test scores resulted in happy faces all around.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected party resulted in a lot of laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her hard work resulted in a well-deserved promotion.
meanings.sent5: The new recipe resulted in a delicious meal for the family.

meanings.sent1: Skipping breakfast resulted in a growling stomach later.
meanings.sent2: Not studying enough resulted in a low grade on the exam.
meanings.sent3: His forgetfulness resulted in a missed opportunity.
meanings.sent4: The delay in the flight resulted in a missed connection.
meanings.sent5: Ignoring the warning signs resulted in a dangerous situation.

meanings.sent1: The movie had a well-resulted ending that left everyone satisfied.
meanings.sent2: The project had a poorly-resulted outcome due to lack of planning.
meanings.sent3: The game had an unexpectedly-resulted finish that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: The negotiation had a peacefully-resulted resolution that pleased both parties.
meanings.sent5: The day had a perfectly-resulted conclusion with a beautiful sunset.
